description:
The cause of this is because the osapi_compute_listen_port that is running collides with the osapi_compute_listen_port used during testing.

The "osapi_listen_port" in nova/tests/integrated/integrated_helpers.py needs to be changed to "osapi_compute_listen_port".

Add a "osapi_volume_listen_port" while you're at it.
title: tests.integrated fails with devstack

comments.content:
The "osapi_listen_port" in ntegrated_helpers.py needs to be changed to "osapi_compute_listen_port".

Add a "osapi_volume_listen_port" while your at it.
